content.question: Which of the following best explains a reaction to the changes in energy production depicted on the graph?

choices.label: Political leaders argued that excessive power consumption was economically wasteful.
Manufacturers began moving factories to countries with sufficient power supplies.
Americans voluntarily reduced their power consumption to save resources.
Environmental groups were formed to lobby against increased pollution.

content.answer: Environmental groups were formed to lobby against increased pollution.

topic.text: 8.13: The Environment and Natural Resources from 1968 to 1980

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
